```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DBI)
library(duckdb)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
con <- dbConnect(duckdb(), "flights.duckdb", read_only = TRUE)
```

```{r}
dbIsValid(con)
tables <- dbListTables(con)
print(tables)

```
```{sql, connection=con}
SELECT airline, AVG(temperature) AS mean_temperature
FROM flights
GROUP BY airline;
```
